action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for improved user experience.
notes: Focus on landing page customization and inbox cleanup.

action_item: Users & Roles - Uncheck the legacy search box to enhance patient record search capabilities.
notes: This allows for more precise searching by combining first name, last name, and gender.

action_item: Security - Change main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the straightforward process in the settings tab.

action_item: Security - Update eSignature ID for document signing.
notes: Ensure to validate current ID before creating a new one.

action_item: Security - Update visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate eSignature ID to access the signature drawing interface.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA format.
notes: Select and order the sections of patient charts to include in summaries.
